name: Disco Elysium
description: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut is the definitive edition of the smash-hit RPG. Pursue your political dreams in new quests, meet and question more of the city's locals, and explore a whole extra area

name: Half-Life 2
description: [Metacritic's 2004 PC Game of the Year] By taking the suspense, challenge and visceral charge of the original, and adding startling new realism and responsiveness,

name: Grand Theft Auto v
description: Los Santos: a sprawling sun-soaked metropolis full of self-help gurus, starlets and fading celebrities, once the envy of the Western world, now struggling to stay alive in a time of economic uncertainty and cheap reality TV

name: Baldur's Gate II: Shadows of Amn
description: An epic continuation of the story that began in Baldur's Gate, this RPG is set along the southern portion of the Sword Coast, a detailed and rich area of the Forgotten Realms called Amn.

name: Persona 5 Royal
description: Prepare for an all-new RPG experience in Persona 5 Royal based in the universe of the award-winning series, Persona! Don the mask of Joker and join the Phantom Thieves of Hearts

name: Portal 2
description: Valve is working on a full-length sequel to its award-winning, mind-bending puzzle action game for the Xbox 360 and PC.

name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
description: The next chapter in the Elder Scrolls saga arrives from the Bethesda Game Studios. Skyrim reimagines the open-world fantasy epic, bringing to life a complete virtual world open for you to explore any way you choose.

name: Mass Effect 2
description: he Mass Effect trilogy is a science fiction adventure set in a vast universe filled with dangerous alien life forms and mysterious uncharted planets.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
description: [Metacritic's 2003 PC Game of the Year] The PC version has enhanced features including improved graphics and sound, additional PC controls, as well as several options for players to customize the game.

name: BioShock Infinite
description: Initially conceived as a floating symbol of American ideals at a time when the United States was emerging as a world power, Columbia is sent to distant shores with great fanfare by a captivated public.

name: Elden Ring
description: A New World Created By Hidetaka Miyazaki And George R. R. Martin. ELDEN RING, developed by FromSoftware, Inc. and BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment Inc., is a fantasy action-RPG adventure set within a world created by Hidetaka Miyazaki creator of the influential DARK SOULS video game series.

name: Diablo
description: The kingdom of Khandaras has fallen into chaos. An unknown force of evil has swept across the land. Plunging it nto civil war and terrorizing the populace. A mad king, his missing son, and a mysterious archbishop are all pieces to the puzzle that faces you.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: With the Empire attacking the Kingdoms of the North and the Wild Hunt, a cavalcade of ghastly riders, breathing down your neck, the only way to survive is to fight back.

name: Company of Heroes
description: A real-time strategy game set in World War II, Company of Heroes brings to life, in full cinematic detail, the greatest war mankind has ever known.

name: Divinity: Original Sin II
description: Master deep, tactical combat. Join up to 3 other players - but know that only one of you will have the chance to become a God.

name: Unreal Tournament 2004
description: Reload, rev up and ride out. The new Tournament is faster, higher and meaner.

name: Starcraft II: Wings of Liberty
description: StarCraft II continues the epic saga of the Protoss, Terran, and Zerg. These three distinct and powerful races clash once again in the fast-paced real-time strategy sequel to the legendary original, StarCraft.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: America, 1899. The end of the wild west era has begun as lawmen hunt down the last remaining outlaw gangs. Those who will not surrender or succumb are killed.

name: Grand Theft Auto III
description: The PC version features enhanced 3D audio. Environmentally scaled and referenced from the player's perspective

name: God of War
description: The God of War has changed... and this is not the Kratos you know. A difficult and unfamiliar road awaits as you explore a stunning retelling of a classic story

name: Hades
description: Defy the god of death as you hack and slash your way out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler from the creators of Bastion and Transistor.

name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
description: Engage in this saga set in the Golden Age of the Republic - over 4,000 years before the first Star Wars film, when both Jedi and Sith number in the thousands.

name: Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos
description: [Metacritic's 2002 PC Game of the Year] It has been nearly fifteen years since the war between the orcs and humans ended. An uneasy peace settled over the land while, for years, the drums of war were silent.

name: Resident Evil 4
description: SURVIVAL IS JUST THE BEGINNING...Resident Evil 4 is a remake of the 2005 original Resident Evil 4. Reimagined for 2023 to bring state-of-the-art survival horror.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Endwalker
description: Endwalker is the fourth expansion pack for FINAL FANTASY XIV Online.

name: Dishonored
description: pproach each assassination with your own unique style. Use shadow and sound to your advantage to traverse silently through levels unseen by enemies, or attack foes head-on as they react to your aggression

name: Overwatch
description: Overwatch is a highly stylized team-based shooter set on earth in the near future.

name: Baldur's Gate
description: Baldur's Gate takes you back to the Forgotten Realms on a visually dazzling role-playing adventure, one that brings to life the grand tradition of Advanced Dungeons & Dragons through cutting edge art and technology.

name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell
description: Infiltrate terrorists' positions, acquire critical intelligence by any means necessary, execute with extreme prejudice, and exit without a trace

name: Batman: Arkham Asylum
description: In Batman: Arkham Asylum, the player assumes the role of Batman as he delivers The Joker to Arkham Asylum. There, the imprisoned super-villains have set a trap and an immersive combat gaming experience unfolds.
